claim_summary: Email preserved verbatim as part of 47240214305 thread.

cues.speaker: Dixon, Jon EA817 <Jon.Dixon@sussex.police.uk>
cues.quote:
Hi Ben
Itâ€™s understandable to have concerns and worries, if you need additional support let me know and I
can make referrals.
As per our conversation yesterday I can confirm that Alanna is still on bail. This was what is called
Initial Bail to start with but as of 2nd February 2025 this bail period has been extended till 4th May
2025. The conditions to not contact you or attend your address remain the same, if she sees you in
the street or at a venue for example she must make all reasonable effort to leave as soon as she
becomes aware. The bail conditions apply to you as you are the victim and will remain as such while
the investigation is ongoing .
I hope that this answers your query.
